title: Pixel 3 haptic feedback stops randomly
content:
Since the January 2021 security update (I am not saying it is caused by this) my pixel 3 randomly stops all vibrating, first noticeable in the haptic vibrations, however it does appear to include vibrations when receiving a phone call as well.

A reboot resolves the issue however it is only a temporary solution.  About 2 hours after I last rebooted it stopped working again.
